meanings.definition: Translations or paraphrases of the text of an opera or other dramatic work, projected above the stage during a performance.
meanings.sent1: The supertitles helped the audience understand the foreign opera.
meanings.sent2: The supertitles were essential for following the storyline of the opera.
meanings.sent3: During the opera, the supertitles suddenly started showing emojis instead of translations!
meanings.sent4: The supertitles floated above the stage like colorful clouds of words.
meanings.sent5: The supertitles glowed brightly, guiding the viewers through the opera's plot.

meanings.definition: Titles or headings that appear above or at the top of a page or screen.
meanings.sent1: The supertitles on the webpage made it easy to navigate.
meanings.sent2: The supertitles at the beginning of the document provided a clear structure.
meanings.sent3: The supertitles on the screen seemed to dance whenever someone scrolled.
meanings.sent4: Her name shone in the supertitles like a beacon of importance.
meanings.sent5: The supertitles stood out boldly, drawing attention to the main points.
